duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership, oversight, and supervision of the women and facility at the Transitional Living Center.
Coach participants to progress toward goal completion and independent living.
Coordinate and make recommendations for policies and procedures.
Develop relationships with volunteers and community organizations that support the participants and staff.
Oversee and assist participants in home cleaning and other tasks to ensure safety and maintenance of home.

education_certification.credential: Preference given to individuals with a degree or experience in behavioral or human services, social work, psychology, education, counseling, or a related field.
